data.title: Fabulous !!
data.text: From the moment I walked into the spa I had an excellent experience. Warm greetings from the receptionists, soothing atmosphere, and a beautiful space. I was guided to the changing room where I received my robe and slippers and was shown to the "relaxation room" to wait for my facial. I had my service with Bailey and it was completely fabulous!! My skin was in need of some love and that's exactly what it got. She paid amazing attention to detail, had an incredibly relaxing touch, and I left feeling rejuvenated!! I will definitely be back to see Bailey :)

data.title: 3 night stay
data.text: this hotel is beautiful, although had I known parking was not included I would have stayed elsewhere. I was also surprised that it was as noisy as it was. Maids chatting away in the hallway as if folks don't sleep late, a family with several children had no control while in the hallways, kids running and crying (more than one incident) I would not stay here again, but it is a beautiful place.

data.title: Bridal horror stories
data.text: My youngest daughter was getting married on Saturday and myself the bride and her sister booked a  mani & pedi on Friday. While getting dressed that evening I noticed several of my nails were smudged. The bride who had gel nails had one smudged also.Good thing we were staying overnight as they could fix our nails in the am.  I have had my nails done at several spa's and never had this problem.I had to go to the rehearsal dinner with smudges on my nails. Plus the price of three mani pedi s was over three hundred dollars. Very disappointed. Will never go there again!

owner_response.author: Deborah G, Manager at The Spa at Providence Biltmore, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Ms Bassi,
I was so surprised to read your review. I know that when you left on Saturday you and your daughter couldn't have been happier with the services. When your daughter told me what a lovely experience it was, I truly had no idea that you were in anyway unhappy. Please contact me at your earliest convenience at 401 455 3100 or dgarman@providencebiltmore.com as I am very confused and would like to speak to you about the experience.
Kind Regards,
Deborah Garman
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Ahhh-mazing experience
data.text: Absolutely love The Spa at the Providence Biltmore. Barbara is an amazing esthetician! She will leave your skin glowing. They also run monthly specials so make sure to ask when booking your appointment.

data.title: Fantastic Spa
data.text: One of the most fantastic spa visits ever. Relaxing, rejuvenating and pleasant experiences one can imagine

data.title: Overpriced for an average spa experience
data.text: My wife and I had a couples massage here 1 day when staying at the Providence Biltmore. They were good massages, though not out of this world or memorable.  Massage therapists were professional and genuinely kind.  Though I've had similar massages elsewhere at 1/3 the price of this place.  I guess considering they're the only hotel with a spa in the property their prices may be justified, but I'd probably think twice about coming back.

data.title: hair and makeup
data.text: Hair was done very nicely although not everyone was happy with it. Makeup nicely done but not as professionally as I would have expected. Probably could have done the same myself.

data.title: Group Spa Day - Incredible
data.text: I have brought my staff to the Biltmore Spa for a Spa Day on 2 occasions.  They did not disappoint on either day.  The employees at the Spa bent over backwards to keep up comfortable and attended to all our needs, including setting up a table for lunch, providing glasses for our Sangria and giving us a private room (so we would not interrupt others day of relaxation).  The facility is gorgeous; the locker room extremely clean and equipped with anything you need; and the treatment rooms were very nice.  The girls services ranged from hot stone massages (all enjoyed this), swedish massages, signature facial, beaute neuve facial, and the pure fiji hydrating body scrub (this was LOVED by all).  I would highly recommend this spa for any group outing.  The scheduling was so easy on both occasions.  I provided the names and services desired for my staff and the coordinator sent me a schedule.  It worked so well, she even incorporated an hour for our lunch.  We will do this again.

data.title: Not my best spa experience
data.text: Got a facial, was good.  Nothing that made it stand out from any other spa that I've been to.  The employees are very nice as is the atmosphere.  But it would be nice if they invested in robes that were longer than above the knees and thicker than a piece of paper.  Honestly, that robe is the reason why I will never return.

data.title: Girls Outing
data.text: One week in October was announced as a special Spa week.  The nearest spa to us was at the Biltmore and I had seven girls be treated for either a facial or a body scrub for $55 (normally advertised at $120).  We did have to leave a $22 tip but it was well worth a wonderful experience

data.title: Wedding Day Princess
data.text: The spa staff at the Biltmore were amazing and I think (and was told by many) that I looked like a Princess on my wedding day. I was very nervous going into my practice session before the wedding, but everyone was so great and put me completely at ease. Gabby (hair) and Ling (makeup) are as good as they get. I brought a picture of what I wanted my hair to look like and Gabby made my hair look better. On the day of the wedding, everyone was professional and efficient and my hair and makeup came out even better than at the practice session. Ling was also available to come and touch up my makeup in the bridal suite in between the ceremony and reception. My whole bridal party got their hair and makeup done as well and everyone was extremely happy with the outcome. My Mom and I got our nails done 2 days before the wedding at the spa as well and Gabby and Ling did our nails too. It was fun to spend so much time with them and get to know them and they are multi-talented, our nails looked great too. I would recommend the Biltmore Spa to any bride/bridal party who is getting married in the Providence area. If your wedding is at the hotel, the ease of just going down to the lobby is great. I highly highly recommend!

data.title: Can't Wait to Get Back Here!
data.text:
I just went here with a friend, because the Spa had a great deal on Groupon.  I got the island pedicure, and my friend had a facial.

We were both impressed by the fact that there was free valet parking, so no added stress about where to park.  We were led upstairs by elevator and shown the two relaxation areas.  We had a morning appointment, and the relaxation area was empty.  The ambiance was great, candles, my friend was very happy that there was no water feature.

I had a glass of water in the relaxation area, which was citrus cucumber, it was very refreshing.  I loved my pedicure, I received a heated neck pillow, and was left to soak my feet for five minutes of relaxing, it was so nice.  The pedicurist brought me water and a magazine.  She did a very professional job, I was very pleased and relaxed.  The only downside is I wish there were more polish colors to choose from.

My friend raved about his facial.  We both cannot wait until we can have another spa day!

data.title: Divine!
data.text: We have been 3 times as a couple and for individual services. The spa is immaculate and the staff is super professional. Check their FB page for specials! The location is very nice. There is a huge Starbucks across the lobby to continue your relaxation which has become a staple for us after we leave the spa. Valet is free for spa guests make sure to get your ticket validated! We didn't know this our first time there.

data.title: Good treatments - nothing fancy
data.text: I got a very good deep tissue massage and exfoliating facial.  Prices were what I would expect.  But the spa itself was pretty basic.  Only amenities offered were water (no fruit - tea - etc).  There were no saunas, whirlpools, etc.  The staff were very nice.  If I were staying at the hotel again - I would use their services again.
